body_html: I use a linux machine for running TensorFlow, but I'm developing on MacBookPro (Early 2013) which has NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M. Though I have installed CUDA on my mac, TensorFlow wouldn't use GPU. Any support will help me quite a lot.
